name: Moh Abdul Haris Angio
about: Experienced DevOps Engineer with over 4 years of professional expertise in designing and implementing automation infrastructures, including CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, GitLab CI, and GitHub Actions. Skilled in building and maintaining scalable and secure Kubernetes clusters to support dynamic application environments. Passionate about exploring new tools and methodologies to enhance development and infrastructure workflows, aligned with organizational needs. A proactive learner with a strong commitment to continuous improvement, capable of thriving in both collaborative team settings and independent work environments.
